siglos, dos razas han ido evolucionando en las profundidades de la...","plot":"Durante siglos, dos razas han ido evolucionando en las profundidades de la Tierra: los aristocr\u00e1ticos y sofisticados vampiros y los brutales hombres-lobo (Lycans), cuya existencia siempre hab\u00eda formado parte del mundo de los mitos y las leyendas. Estas razas nocturnas son enemigas mortales y est\u00e1n condenadas a vivir en perpetua guerra hasta que s\u00f3lo una de ellas sobreviva. En medio de este conflicto ancestral, una Guerrera Vampiro, Selene, descubre una conspiraci\u00f3n de los Lycan para secuestrar a Michael, un joven m\u00e9dico. Despu\u00e9s de seguirlo por toda la ciudad, Selene entabla una ins\u00f3lita relaci\u00f3n con \u00e9l, y cuando los Lycans se deciden a atacar, se interpone entre ellos y el m\u00e9dico. Mientras intenta salvar a Michael, descubre un plan de los Lycans para crear nuevas criaturas que combinen los poderes de ambas razas y carezcan de sus debilidades. Este proyecto, de hacerse realidad, favorecer\u00eda a los Hombres-lobo.","cast":[{"name":"Kate Beckinsale","role":"Selene","images":{"face":"\/8b\/67\/8b67b18f4c40a1da00f828f130ca13c0.jpg"},"id":761},{"name":"Scott Speedman","role":"Michael Corvin","images":null,"id":36562},{"name":"Michael Sheen","role":"Lucian","images":{"face":"\/a2\/de\/a2de346b4715bc59bd102bd627240d25.jpg"},"id":438},{"name":"Shane Brolly","role":"Kraven","images":null,"id":155476},{"name":"Bill Nighy","role":"Viktor","images":{"face":"\/bc\/06\/bc06e4bf4d39cb28bb38ea7a1d3361d8.jpg"},"id":4916},{"name":"Erwin Leder","role":"Singe","images":null},{"name":"Sophia Myles","role":"Erika","images":null,"id":62002},{"name":"Robbie Gee","role":"Kahn","images":null,"id":77033},{"name":"Wentworth Miller","role":"Dr. Adam Lockwood","images":{"face":"\/1c\/46\/1c46d429c6db1a38a8e2882a2db2fe69.jpg"},"id":4971},{"name":"Kevin Grevioux","role":"Raze","images":{"face":"\/3a\/42\/3a42bdde2ff28052c9a13cc405b9ba6e.jpg"},"id":14195}],"genres":["Action","Fantasy","Thriller"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":117982,"numRatings":29268,"ratingHistogram":{"1":262,"2":630,"3":4544,"4":13874,"5":9958},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Lakeshore Entertainment","images":null},{"name":"Laurinfilm","images":null},{"name":"Subterranean Productions LLC","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"Kevin Grevioux","images":{"face":"\/3a\/42\/3a42bdde2ff28052c9a13cc405b9ba6e.jpg"},"id":14195},{"name":"Len Wiseman","images":null,"id":78283}],"countries":["GB","DE","HU","US"],"directors":[{"name":"Len Wiseman","images":null,"id":78283}],"composer":null,"availability":{"inTheaters":false,"vodSummary":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"vod":[],"schedule":[],"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"status":1,"statusMedia":"watched"}
